preferences.discussion_merged: Seseorang telah menggabungkan salah satu diskusi Saya dengan diskusi yang lain

post.merged: {count, plural, one {Merged # post from {titles}.} other {Merged # posts from {titles}.}}

settings.search_result_help: Berapa banyak diskusi yang harus ditampilkan saat mencari dalam popup `Merge Discussions`. Standarnya adalah 4

merged.body:
Hey {recipient_display_name},
Your discussion, {merged_discussion_title}, was merged into {discussion_title} by {actor_display_name}.
View it here {discussion_url} .
merged.subject: Your discussion "{merged_discussion_title}" was merged
